suncertify.ui

Interface WindowManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWindow, ClientConfigWindow, ClientWindow, ServerConfigWindow, StandaloneConfigWindow

    public interface WindowManager
    WindowManager is the common interface for all UI frames in the application. It defines useful method signatures for displaying messages to the user, handling exceptions, initializing frame components and generating content for the frame the form of a JPanel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JPanel createContentPanel()
      Generates all the content for the frame inside a JPanel and returns the panel.
      void displayMessage(String message, String title)
      Displays the specified message to the user in a dialog box with the specified title and an information icon.
      void handleException(String message, String title, Exception exception)
      Logs the specified exception to the console and displays the specified message to the user in a dialog box with the specified title.
      void handleFatalException(String errorMessage, Exception exception)
      Logs the specified exception to the console and displays the specified errorMessage to the user in a dialog box before closing the application.
      void initializeComponents()
      Initializes any window components, and adds any listeners required to the appropriate components.

    • Method Detail

      • createContentPanel

        JPanel createContentPanel()
        Generates all the content for the frame inside a JPanel and returns the panel.
        Returns:
        the JPanel containing the frame content.

      • displayMessage

        void displayMessage(String message,
                    String title)
        Displays the specified message to the user in a dialog box with the specified title and an information icon.
        Parameters:
        message - the message displayed to the user.
        title - the title of the dialogue box.

      • handleException

        void handleException(String message,
                     String title,
                     Exception exception)
        Logs the specified exception to the console and displays the specified message to the user in a dialog box with the specified title.
        Parameters:
        message - the message displayed to the user.
        title - the title of the dialogue box.
        exception - the exception to log.

      • handleFatalException

        void handleFatalException(String errorMessage,
                          Exception exception)
        Logs the specified exception to the console and displays the specified errorMessage to the user in a dialog box before closing the application.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - the error message displayed to the user.
        exception - the exception to log.

      • initializeComponents

        void initializeComponents()
        Initializes any window components, and adds any listeners required to the appropriate components.
